snippet: A Hollywood wife today often pursues a career and is involved in social consciousness-raising, far from those dinner-party-giving stereotypes.
abstract: List of Hollywood wives whose own careers nearly rival the ones of their powerful husbands noted.
lead_paragraph: A Hollywood wife today often pursues a career and is involved in social consciousness-raising, far from those dinner-party-giving stereotypes.

headline.seo: For These Couples, Power Isn’t Just His
headline.main: For These Couples, Power Isn’t Just His
headline.print_headline: For These Couples, Power Isn’t Just His
